Function Documentation
getAnalogOutputModuleServiceParam() getAnalogOutputModuleServiceParamAnalogOutputModuleApi.c AnalogOutputModuleApi.cgetAnalogOutputModuleServiceParam
uint8_t getAnalogOutputModuleServiceParam (uint16_t analog_output_handler, uint16_t parameter_name, void * data)
Retrieves the service parameter data for a specified AO module.
Parameters
inanalog_output_handler
The handler for the AO device.
inparameter_name
The name of the parameter to retrieve.
outdata
Pointer to the buffer where the retrieved data will be stored.
Returns
Returns an error code indicating the status of the operation. Refer to error_code_t for possible error codes.
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

Parameters
inao_device_handler
The handler for the AO device.
outaomod_processdata
Pointer to the aomodule_processinfo structure to store process data.
